text: The place is great but the staffs look like not welcome . After prawn we request for bbq but the staff told me today no bbq becos of the weather (that time no rain at all and previously have customer bbq before the bbq pit still hot) the lady came to look and anyhow say the bbq pit heat since morning not just now (what nonsense?? I saw the person bbq the prawn JUST NOW only) and say today we close for bbq. Awhile later have 3 guys want to bbq too and go complain at the reception. Inthe end that malaysian guy come to light up the pit with charcoal after i ask why just now u all say cannot bbq and now can, he nv answer and just walk away no manner. I will not come back again for sure.
pretty empty on weekdays, prawns were restocked every 2hrs. caught about 7 prawns in 3hrs

Second time prawn fishing at this location and had fun with the family , despite arriving at lunch time, so late for fishing but still managed to catch a few in 1h30min that spent there and enjoying the BBQ afterwards. Lots of places to eat in the complex too.

Hai Bin located at 6 Tebing Ln, #01-04, Singapore 828835. A place to chill out with cool beers n grill bbq prawns if you are unlucky and caught a lots of them from the ponds. There are 4 ponds. You can bring your own fishing rod or rent from Hai Bin. Good relaxing place for families, friends or couples . I just visited this place last weekend . Happy hour one tower beer $44/ üòÄüëç
Got a few catches for past 3 hours. No empty handed. Lady staff was friendly and welcoming.
